Install steps r here:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    1) Unrar.
    2) Mount the .mdf file using daemon tools or Power ISO
    3) Install the game. Use Serial key 7931-9865028-6024865-1156 during installation.
    4) And then play :)
